mapper.select: SELECT d.id ,d.`avg_days`,d.`create_time`,d.`detail_id`,d.`detail_status`,d.`execut_time`,d.`left_proportion`,d.`proportion`,d.`rule_id`,d.`update_time`,d.app_id dapp_id, t.id tid, t.`rule_id` truleid, t.`chian_id` tchianid, t.`coin_id` tcoinid, t.`create_time` tcreatetime, t.`fr_status` tstatus, t.`mom` tmom, t.`pay_passwd` tpaypasswd, t.`public_key` tpublickey, t.`update_time` tupdatetime ,t.fr_type tfrtype,t.app_id tapp_id, s.`currency` scurrency,s.`token_address` tokenaddress,f.id fid, f.`account` faccount, f.`address` faddress,f.`amount` famount, f.`create_time` fcreatetime, f.`chain_id` fchainid , f.`coin_id` fcoinid , f.`customer_id` fcustomer_id, f.`import_time` fimporttime, f.`rule_id` fruleid, f.`source_id` fsourceid, f.`source_status` fsourcestatus, f.`update_time` fupdatetime , f.`wallet_id` fwalletid,f.app_id fapp_id FROM frozen_release_detail_rule d LEFT JOIN frozen_release_rule t ON d.`rule_id` = t.`rule_id` LEFT JOIN main_chain c ON t.chian_id=c.chain_id LEFT JOIN sub_chain s ON t.coin_id=s.coin_id LEFT JOIN frozen_release_excel_source f ON f.`rule_id` = t.`rule_id` WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) >=TO_DAYS(execut_time) AND f.`source_status` != 3 AND d.`detail_status` != 3 AND d.`detail_status` != 2 order by d.`execut_time` ;
